amendment.description: Amendment reduces and then increases by the same amount funding for Nonproliferation, Anti-Terrorism, Demining, and Related Programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to shift $7 million in funding from the nonproliferation, anti-terrorism, de-mining and related programs account to the Small Arms/Light Weapons Destruction initiative.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
